changeSet.author: vitalii.kim
changeSet.sql:
create table if not exists dim_warehouse ( id bigserial primary key,
account_id bigint not null, source_platform text not null,
external_warehouse_id text not null, warehouse_name text not null,
fulfillment_model varchar(16) not null, is_active boolean not null default true,
created_at timestamptz not null default now(), updated_at timestamptz not null default now(),
constraint uq_dim_warehouse_source unique (account_id, source_platform, external_warehouse_id) );
changeSet.rollback: drop table if exists dim_warehouse cascade;
